generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Supreme Court Justices Couldn't Stop Interrupting Each Other During DACA Oral Arguments," you can expect an overview of the recent oral arguments regarding the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program. It may also provide insights into the legal implications of the case and the potential outcomes that could affect DACA recipients. Additionally, the piece could examine the broader context of immigration policy and its impact on the nation.
